backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with user profiles, deposit/withdrawal requests, referral bonuses, earning plans, and related query functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML bootstrap file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s router structure and wraps all pages in AuthGate, AppLayout, and theming.
frontend/src/components/admin/PendingDep: Admin table for reviewing, approving, or rejecting pending deposit requests, including screenshot preview.
frontend/src/components/admin/PendingWit: Admin table for reviewing, approving, or rejecting pending withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/components/AdminGate.tsx: Restricts access to admin-only areas, showing loading or denial UI when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Top navigation header with responsive menus, page links, branding, and login button.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the app’s page layout including header, content container, and footer.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login flow and shows a login screen for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/CopyToClipboardB: Button that copies provided text to clipboard and shows success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/DepositRequestLi: Displays the user's deposit requests with status, amounts, and dates, including loading and empty states.
File upload component with preview, clear functionality, and support for custom labels and accepted types.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading state and error handling.
frontend/src/components/PlanCard.tsx: Shows investment plan details including deposit, profit, duration, ROI, and optional child content.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawalReques: Displays the user's withdrawal requests with status, method, account info, and dates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on identity changes and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as plans, balances, user profiles, deposits, and withdrawals.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining global styles, theme variables, and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays and edits the user's profile, prompting setup if missing and saving updates via mutations.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard offering tabs to review pending deposit and withdrawal requests, gated behind an admin check.
frontend/src/pages/DepositPage.tsx: Allows users to select a plan, view deposit details, upload payment proof, and submit deposit requests.
frontend/src/pages/PlansPage.tsx: Shows a hero section and a list of available investment plans, linking users to the deposit workflow.
frontend/src/pages/ReferralsPage.tsx: Displays the referral dashboard showing the user's referral code, link, stats, and bonus tiers, with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Shows available balance, accrued earnings from the active plan, and details of the approved deposit, with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawalsPage.tsx: Provides a form to submit withdrawal requests with validation, displays limits, and lists past withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/utils/earnings.ts: Computes accrued earnings based on start time, duration, and daily profit, returning dates, elapsed days, and totals.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL or session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, container settings, and plugins such as typography and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for the Earn app, including plan details, deposit/withdrawal rules, referral bonuses, required images, and implemented features. Contains configuration, architectural notes, and no known issues.
